TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MustRunInClientContextAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MustRunInClientContextAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MustRunInClientContextAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Forces the attributed object to be created in the context of the creator, if possible. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the context attributes of the attributed object conflict with those of the context of the creator, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException?displayProperty=nameWithType> is thrown when an attempt is made to create the object.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
